roleset.name: set, establish, decide, already established
roleset.note: DETERMINE-V NOTES: Member of VNcls discover-84, conjecture-29.5-1. Updated by Julia, 12/2010. (from determine.01-v)
DETERMINATION-N NOTES: Based on nouns-00080. VN class discover-84 and conjecture-29.5-1. Framed by Katie. (from determination.01-n)
DETERMINED-J NOTES: Roleset based on instances in BOLT P01, parts 2,3. Framed by Claire. (from determined.01-j)

example.name: determine-v: passive, no attribute
example.text: [The exact amount of the refund]-1 will be determined *trace*-1 next year, based on actual collections made until Dec 31 of this year.
example.arg: based on actual collections made until Dec 31 of this year

example.name: determine-v: with agent and attribute
example.text: John determined the cheap diamonds to actually be plastic.

example.name: determination-n: Arg 0 and 1
example.text: their determination to shore up investor confidence(1

example.name: determination-n: another with arg 0 and 1
example.text: a determination by industrial nations to curb inflation

example.name: determination-n: Arg 0 and 1 (are you seeing a theme here?)
example.text: his determination to face historical truth

example.name: determined-j
example.text: Just cut the determined number of panels in the determined cut length.

roleset.name: characterized by determination
roleset.note: DETERMINED-J NOTES: Roleset based on instances in BOLT P01, parts 2,3. Framed by Claire. (from determined.02-j)

example.name: All args
example.text: I was determined to restore the range of motion and to return to my old exercise routine , so I in effect took charge of the rehab program and made it clear to the therapist the Orthopedic Surgeon that I would n't accept less .
example.arg: to restore the range of motion and to return to my old exercise routine
